Package com.googlecode.sarasvati.visual

Interface Summary
NodeWidgetFactory Generates an appropriate Widget for the given Node.
ProcessTreeNodeWidgetFactory  
 

Class Summary
AbstractGraphVisualizer Base class for a standalone graph visualizer.
AbstractProcessVisualizer Base class for a standalone process visualizer.
DefaultNodeWidgetFactory Generates widgets for nodes using the Adaptable.getAdaptor(Class) method, passing in the Component class.
DefaultProcessTreeNodeWidgetFactory Generates widgets using a TaskIcon for nodes of type 'task', and DefaultNodeIcon for all other node types.
HTMLImageMapHelper Utility class to help generating HTML Image maps of graphs and processes.
